Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis hosts Washington in cross-conference contest
Washington finished 15-67 overall last season while going 8-33 on the road
The Grizzlies averaged 17.4 points off of turnovers, 13.4 second-chance points and 33.0 bench points last season
The Wizards averaged 113.7 points per game while allowing opponents to score 123.0 last season
Others: Injuries: Grizzlies - John Konchar: day to day (quad), Desmond Bane: out (oblique), Luke Kennard: day to day (foot), Vince Williams Jr.: out (leg), Marcus Smart: out (ankle), GG Jackson II: out (foot ), Cam Spencer: out (anknee)
Wizards - Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Kyle Kuzma: day to day (groin), Marvin Bagley III: day to day (illness)
